item.title: Show item bug
item.dc:creator: @reapagescapeftw1 reapagescapeftw
item.description:
@reapagescapeftw1 wrote:

hey guys im trying to add this to my server

RemoveAllWindows();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
showitem(4718, “msg”, “msg, msg”);

for my server like it shows that item id and says that text but i get this when i try to compile it

client.java:4282: cannot find symbol symbol : method showitem,4718, "msg", "msg", msg"); location: class client showitem,4718, "msg", "msg",msg"); Note: stream.java uses or overrides with deprecated API Note: recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details

please help me
